column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Stephen - Thank you so much for the amazing review. We appreciate it very much. I'm glad you enjoyed our fare and ambience. Although we make our share of mistakes and missteps
column2: and we try to learn from them
column3: it's still nice to receive high praise when we do right. On behalf of the entire staff
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
